content:
12    攻擊時，有2%的機率使所有敵人進入束縛狀態3秒。
(若敵人高於Lv70，則減少進入異常狀態的機率和效果；反之，則增加機率和效果)


[if]

[cooltime]
10000    
[attack success]
1    

[/if]

[then]

[target]
`all enemy`
-1    
[duration]
3000    
[reduce duration to human armor at pvp module]
60    
[probability]
5    
[reduce probability to human armor at pvp module]
80    
[active status]
`hold`
70    
[/then]
